website_summaries.verdict: These cube-shaped solar lanterns are less expensive than other brands, but only last about 8 hours each on a full charge. So, consider when you want to use them.
pros: 10 bright LED lights in each lamp, and 1000-milliampere hour rechargeable lithium polymer battery
Lasts up to 8 hours on a charge of 6 to 12 hours
cons: No charge level indicator, so you don't know its power level

customer_reviews.title: Liar Liar Pants of Fire. Only 50% as bright as claimed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to supplement my 2 year old circular inflatable lamp of which the current models claim 70 Lumins. The new one claims 90. The new one is at least 1/3 dimmer than the old lantern thus would actually be around 40-50, around half of what is claimed. Exaggeration is one thing but misstating a product's capacity by 50%, is a lie in my book. Back it goes and hopefully this review will prevent others from making the same mistake and wasting time repacking and sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping!!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are amazing. They will last at least 12 hours! We sent them with our son for a camping trip to Hawaii. He said they lasted all night long as a nightlight for the kids. Easy transport as well. They were stored in the top of the sleeping bag pouch and made it through baggage with zero issues. Compact and easy to use! They would charge them on the dash of the car during the day and use them at night. Never lost strength.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Compresses very small and weighs very little. The light is pretty bright.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H.

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I did not even get a chance to use these I opened them up I looked at them assured they worked then I went to get them back out I went to turn them on they were dead well seeing their supposedly to be solar I had them in the sun for several days they would not even hold a charge let alone turn on what a disappointment save your money don't waste your time
customer_reviews.author: patrick d frasik

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: We love these little solar lights for camping. This is my first of this brand. It seems to work fine but my complaint is it lacks any type of charge indicator so its impossible to know if it needs to be charged more or not. Other brands have this feature and it is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: They work beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for camping and also to serve as lighting for storms or power outages. They work great - better than a flashlight! They light up a whole room as a few large canndle would. Great to hang from a tent. They hold their charge for days when not in use. They turn off and on with a little switch on the top. They fold up and take up very little space for camping. Very durable, I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: HOLLY

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: One of the balloon solar light that was sent to me wAs broken. The minute I tried to use it, air would pop out
customer_reviews.author: Headphone

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered six of these between two different orders. The first two worked fine and charged as expected. Of the next four I ordered three of them were very dim and won’t charge to a full charge. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Leder

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money.
customer_reviews.text: Only one worked out of box. The needs alot of sun to finally charge. Light output is more like a night light at home. Hoky junk.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Beck

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Super cool! Has different levels of light and takes very little room when you deflate!
customer_reviews.author: T Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Look where your order is coming from
customer_reviews.text: Sadly not happy with quality- they worked the first night but now not!
customer_reviews.author: Tx Auntie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping!
customer_reviews.text: These are small & lightweight and bright . They charge fast and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Bueler

customer_reviews.title: brilliant design.
customer_reviews.text: Fits needs not addressed anywhere near as well in the market. Makes a great running light for a small sailboat or kayak. Makes a great anchor light.
customer_reviews.author: Russell D.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Great all around. When not being used for camping one gets used as a night light
customer_reviews.author: Jaina Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This solar lantern works as promised, is very light for backpacking, easy t operate and provide outstanding light.....have not taken it for a test run yet, but out of the box it is all and more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: loved them my daughter uses them for anight light in our camper
customer_reviews.author: roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last lights.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when they first came out and loved them .They lasted found yrs. These new one didn't last but for a yr. Won't spend that kind of lites again.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: long life
customer_reviews.text: This little thing lasts for hours and hours. It is waterproof too. (I left it in the rain)
customer_reviews.author: James R. Benvie

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable
customer_reviews.text: The lasted over 12 hours on medium and roughly 10 hours on high. Love these
customer_reviews.author: william Buters

customer_reviews.title: Great solar light
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small, yet bright enough. 3 different settings are nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Gleeson

product_meta.title: Choreau Inflatable Frosted Cube Solar Survival Emergency Lantern, Waterproof Rechargeable Solar Powered LED Light, Camping Hiking Hunting Fishing Patio Parties Flashlight Lantern
feature_bullets: 100% SOLAR POWERED - This cube lantern is built-in 10 bright LED light and 1000 mah rechargeable lithium polymer battery, it's compeletly powered by the sun, no additional batteries needed. Charge time of 8 hours yields a minimum of 6-12 hours of light.

3 LIGHTING MODES - 3 different lighting modes normal (40 Lumen), bright (90 lumen) and flashing mode, fulfill your daily life and emergency situations lighting. The range of the illumination is approximate 15 square feet. Suitable for various indoor and outdoor activities.

WATERPOOF AND LIGHTWEIGHT - Waterproof PVC enclosure suits all weather conditions, the waterproof rate up to IP68 and the weight is only 110g, you don't worry about it dropping in the water. The features allowed the lantern using in rainy or moist weather conditions.

PORTABLE DESIGN - Inflating nozzle make it easy to inflate and fold after deflated, it can be easily hanged in backpacks or handle by hand. Don't worry about children touching, is safe for children use, it can be use as a night reading light for children.

WIDELY APPLICATIONS - It widely use in outdoor activities like camping, hiking, hunting, fishing, patio. Also can be use in emergency situations such as roadside assistance, blackouts, flood and other disaster rescue. Beside above applications, it can be use in Halloween, Christmas and New Year lighting decoration.
